casebody.data:
(Republished)

Adrenne A. Rothstein, as Guardian ad Litem for Joshua A. Rothstein, Respondent-Appellant, v Alan R. Davidson, Appellant-Respondent.

Judgment, Supreme Court, New York County, entered on February 15, 1980, unanimously affirmed, without costs and without disbursements. The order of this court entered on October 30, 1980 is vacated. No opinion. Concur — Kupferman, J. P., Sandler, Markewich, Bloom and Yesawich, JJ.
